text: Zhang Shuai was the defending champion, but she withdrew before her first round match against Wang Yafan. Wang Qiang won the title, defeating Yulia Putintseva in the final, 6–1, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky loser=== ===Qualifying Draw=== ====First Qualifier==== ====Second Qualifier==== ====Third Qualifier==== ====Fourth Qualifier==== ====Fifth Qualifier==== ====Sixth Qualifier==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Guangzhou International Women's Open - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 Guangzhou International Women's Open – Singles
